entities.name: minister of magic
entities.description: The position that Barty Crouch Jr. had dedicated his life to becoming.

entities.name: barty crouch jr.
entities.description: Barty Crouch Jr.'s fatherly affection was stretched just far enough to give his son a trial.

entities.name: dark mark
entities.description: The symbol that Barty Crouch Jr. associated with the Dark Mark.

entities.name: azkaban
entities.description: The location where Barty Crouch Jr.'s son was sent by his father.

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: The creatures that brought in Barty Crouch Jr.'s son and took him into a cell near Sirius's.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius saw the dementors bringing in Barty Crouch Jr.'s son through the bars in his cell door.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry asked if Barty Crouch Jr. gave his own son to the dementors.

relationships.description: Barty Crouch Jr. had dedicated his whole life to becoming Minister of Magic.
He associated himself with the Dark Mark again.
The dementors brought in Barty Crouch Jr.'s son and took him into a cell near Sirius's.
Barty Crouch Jr. gave his own son to the dementors.
Sirius saw the dementors bringing in Barty Crouch Jr.'s son through the bars in his cell door.
Harry asked if Barty Crouch Jr. gave his own son to the dementors.
